Package com.cloudia.cloudia_android

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutMenu
    Creates the about fragment.
    BaseActivity
    The base activty is used to call the other activities of the program.
    BuildConfig  
    CloudiaActivity
    Main Activity of the app.
    FetchSensorAlerts
    Get the data from the web site cloudiaproject.org/api/sensors_alerts and send the json informations in a object list of alert.
    Icons
    This class is not implemented yet.
    LoginActivity
    A login screen that offers login via username/password.
    PreferencesActivity
    This is the class we call to populate our preferences in the settings
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.integer  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.raw  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    R.xml  
    SensorActivity
    This is the activity when a station is selected.
    SensorOverviewActivity
    This is the activity for the overview of a sensor (when clicked in the list).
    SensorsListAdapter
    This is the adapter for the sensors' list.
    ShowAllActivity
    This is the activity when "show all" from the sensor's overview is clicked.
    ShowAllListAdapter
    This is the adapter for "show all"'s list.
    SplashActivity
    This is the activity displayed while the application is loading information from the database.
    StationsListAdapter
    This is the adapter for "show all"'s list.
